lines.line:
#Mipa
Oh! Pretty high wall!
But, I am can hop enough to get there!
#None
Press ① button to jump.

#Mipa
The passage is blocked. But I think I can try to move this box.
#None
Keep moving on a box to push it.

#Mipa
OH! Button!
What does it do?
There only one way to check this out!
#None
Press ③ to interact with buttons and switches.

#Mipa
This door is locked...
#Mipa
Should be the way to open it!

#Mipa
This box cound be helpful to get on this height.
I can try to use my Manget Hand to pull that box.
#None
Press and hold ② button to use Magnet hand.

#Mipa
There is two indicators above this door...
...
Looks like more than one button need to be pressed to open the door.

#Mipa
The laser below looks very unfriendly.
Need to find way to disable it.

#Mipa
Wooh...That was tricky.

#Note
Expedition Log Number 0.
The rooms here are arranged in a strange way.
All traps and puzzles are simply reset to their default state once new visitor is come in.
Interesting security system design.
#Mipa
... ... ... ...

#Note
Expedition Log Number 1.
These rays, or more accurately lasers, have odd structure.
Their power is high enough to destroy metal. But nevertheless, walls and boxes block radiation.
Wall and boxes materials cannot be defined.
#Mipa
Oh...
Well, at least I already know that lasers are bad, and boxes are good!

#Note
Expedition Log Number 2.
Currently unknown, how foreign objects end up here.
But any attempt to bring them out the room they are in was unsuccessful.
Most strange, that origin of some objects for sure not alien.
#None
FPS counter cheat: ③③③④④④②②②②

#Mipa
Hello?
..........
#Poky
Ssshhhhhhhh!
..........
Let me enjoy sound of azure waterfall
#Mipa
Is it really azure?
#Poky
Of course it is!
How can not you see it?
#Mipa
OH! Sorry, my visors seeing everything in monochrome...
#Poky
Don't jump on bridge! It's flimsy.

#Mipa
Are you sure your sprites are final?
#Jobee
No idea!
Do I look good?
#Mipa
Well....
Better than previous version, I did say!
#Jobee
Thanks!
#Mipa
... ...
...
. . . . .
Date you later!
#Jobee
What?

#Mipa
Cheater!

#Mipa
Hm...When this button down, door is open.
I need to find something to keep this button pressed.

#Mipa
How weird!
Very carbonated liquid in bottle!
It pulls so much....
I guess, I can even use it...
#None
Press ① button in air to do second jump.

#Mipa
Bottle is just disappeared!
Looks like, I can't bring stuff from previous rooms...
...
Hope I will find it again!
It was fun!

#Mipa
Yay!
#None
All current passive items can be seen in upper-right corner.

#Mipa
The soil... Intresting...

#Mipa
Oh what is it?
Waterfall? Lavafall? I can't see...

#Wasp
Freeze!
#Mipa
???
#Wasp
Don't dare to move!
You can't enter Hive!
#Mipa
Hive?
#Wasp
!!!
Everyone knows, here is our Hive! And we not allow anyone to enter, unless Queen said so!
#Mipa
But...this the only way!
Maybe...I can just go to queen, and ask herself?
#Wasp
UUUGH! I said! You can't enter Hive!!!
Enough of you!
I will kindly show you other way!
#Mipa
OH! Really?

#Wasp
I will make sure, you understand.

#Wasp
Okay!
Okay!
You win!

#Mipa
This is mine Magnet Hand!
I can use this to pull objects!
...
I guess, I always had it...can't remember.

#Mipa
This mysterious ring gives POWER!
So...it can be called Power Ring!
...
This can help me to lift heavy objects, maybe even throw them.

#Mipa
Crashbomber!
I feel, like I seen one before, but never had a chance to use it before.

#Mipa
This is bottle! And it has very carbonated liquid inside of it.
It has lable sticker attached to it saying 'KoaKola'.
I have no idea what it means.

#Mipa
Jobee gave me this jar. She said this honey very sticky.
And this is true!

#None
Somewhere in space...

#None
Planet called [REDACTED], been colonized by a self-aware robots.

#None
Year after year, they were harvesting essential mineral.
That they used to produce even more a-like self robots.

#None
But once upon a time...
Mysterious floating pyramid appeared.

#None
It's forcefield emitted strange light that interrupted process of harvesting this mineral.

#None
And then [REDACTED], decided to send expeditioner, right inside this pyramid.
To find the way to disable forcefield.

#None
And name of this expeditioner was...
